type SecurityPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Describes a set of security permissions applied to code.

span.span: Describes a set of security permissions applied to code.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Diese Berechtigung verwendet die Enumeration.This permission uses the enumeration. Die Werte für diese Enumeration finden Sie in der Dokumentation.The values for this enumeration can be found in its documentation.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with either restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Erstellt entweder einen vollständig eingeschränkten (`None`) oder `Unrestricted` Zugriff auf alle Sicherheitsberechtigungen.Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to all security permissions.

remarks.format: ## Examples Das folgende Codebeispiel veranschaulicht die Verwendung von der Konstruktor zum Erstellen von Instanzen der Klasse, die an den Sicherheitsberechtigungen für die Anforderung verwendet werden.The following code example shows the use of the constructor to create instances of the class that are used to demand security permissions. Das vollständige Codebeispiel finden Sie unter der Konstruktor.For the complete code example, see the constructor. summary.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.

returns.span: A copy of the current permission.

span.span: A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Eine Kopie einer Berechtigung stellt den gleichen Zugriff auf Ressourcen wie die ursprüngliche Berechtigung dar.A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Einzelne Berechtigungsbits können bestimmt werden, indem Sie eine AND-Operation für diesen Wert und für ungleich NULL.Individual permission bits can be determined by performing an AND operation against this value and checking for nonzero.

param.name: target

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die Schnittmenge zweier Berechtigungen ist eine Berechtigung, die den Zustand beschreibt, den beide gemeinsam beschreiben.The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state that they both describe in common. Nur eine Anforderung, die beide ursprünglichen Berechtigungen erfolgreich durchläuft, wird die Schnittmenge übergeben.Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die aktuelle Berechtigung ist eine Teilmenge der angegebenen Berechtigung, wenn die aktuelle Berechtigung eine Reihe von Vorgängen angibt, die vollständig in die angegebene Berechtigung enthalten ist.The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. Eine Berechtigung, die Zugriff auf C:\example.txt darstellt wird z. B. eine Teilmenge einer Berechtigung, die Zugriff auf "c:" darstellt\\.For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. Wenn diese Methode gibt `true`, die aktuelle Berechtigung stellt keine umfassenderen Zugriff auf die geschützte Ressource als die angegebene Berechtigung.If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed

summary.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Eine uneingeschränkte Berechtigung darstellt Zugriff auf allen Ressourcen, die durch die Berechtigung geschützten.An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Das Ergebnis eines Aufrufs von eine Berechtigung, alle Vorgänge, die dargestellt darstellt, wird von der aktuellen Berechtigung und der angegebenen Berechtigung ist.The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. Jede Anforderung, entweder Berechtigung durchläuft, übergibt die Union.Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
